American countries, range in coverage from about 1 million participants, as in Honduras’s 
PRAF (68), to 45 million participants in Brazil’s BF Programme (65). About 15% and 25% of the 
population (100% of the targeted poor) are covered with these programmes respectively.
Estimates of programme intensity are based on the amount of transfer provided to beneficiaries. 
Among CT programmes, transfers range from US$ 6/household per month in Mozambique’s 
National Institute of Social Action (INAS) F
